name: PMP CLI
description: Command-line interface for managing and interacting with PMP applications. Streamline your workflow with powerful CLI tools.

name: PMP Cloud Inspector
description: Cloud infrastructure inspection and monitoring tool. Gain visibility into your cloud resources and configurations.

name: PMP Workflow
description: Workflow automation and orchestration engine. Design and execute complex workflows with ease.

name: PMP Auth API
description: Authentication and authorization API service. Secure your applications with robust identity management.

name: PMP Gateway API
description: API gateway for routing, load balancing, and managing microservices. Unified entry point for your platform.

name: PMP File API
description: File storage and management API. Handle file uploads, downloads, and organization with a simple REST interface.

name: PMP Mock HTTP
description: HTTP mocking service for development and testing. Simulate API responses and test integration scenarios.

name: PMP Message Queue API
description: Message queue and pub/sub system. Enable reliable asynchronous communication between services.
